objectives: Students will discuss hobbies and free time using Neutral/Standard register language
Students will engage with Historical themed scenarios related to hobbies and free time
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of neutral level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining hobbies and free time content with Historical narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore hobbies and free time through a Historical lens using Neutral/Standard language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a historical period or event involving hobbies and free time

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice neutral register vocabulary related to hobbies and free time in a historical context
Students engage in historical themed role-play about hobbies and free time using neutral register
Students create original historical themed content about hobbies and free time in neutral register

discussion_questions: How would you describe hobbies and free time in a Historical scenario?
What tradition or heritage might be involved in hobbies and free time?
Can you create a Historical story about hobbies and free time?
How does hobbies and free time change when viewed through a Historical perspective?
What neutral register expressions would you use to discuss this historical scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Historical situation involving hobbies and free time
roles: Character A: Using neutral register in historical context
Character B: Responding in neutral register within historical theme

topic_genre_blend: hobbies and free time with tradition
hobbies and free time with heritage
hobbies and free time with legacy

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Neutral/Standard throughout: Standard professional communication
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Historical theme: Past eras, historical events, period settings

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Neutral/Standard register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Historical themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of neutral register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
